attributes.action: Imegrants must only be allowd in to the country if an only if they have work and they must pay into the system for at least 12 months
attributes.additional_details: With all the talk of cuts to all sectors wether it be benefits for the disabled to the NHS I think if all the new comers to the country were to come with work or money to start a new life till they find work then the government would not have to make so many cuts to the people who need it the most.im all for the country showing support to its  European neighbours but only if it betters our own people so please mr Cameron if you must make the cuts make them in the right place's for the good of a once great country
